search_results.title: The Story of The Elders
search_results.snippet: On his 89th birthday, 18 July 2007, Nelson Mandela brought together the Elders to be independent moral voices for peace and ethical leadership.

search_results.title: Who we are
search_results.snippet: The Elders was founded by Nelson Mandela in 2007. We are an independent group of global leaders working for peace, justice, human rights and a sustainable ...
